response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs, making it an invaluable asset to your collection. Given its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, we believe its true value lies in the experiences and benefits it can bring to you, which we estimate to be around $12,000. Considering this, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $13,500. We understand that every decision involves careful consideration, and we hope that our offer presents a favorable opportunity for both parties. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 13500}
